# 7 Best Free Car Maintenance Apps

Stacey Martin

June 24, 2022

Your car is one of your most important assets. To ensure it's operating at its
best, it is vital to stay on top of your vehicle's scheduled services like oil
changes and tire rotations. That's where car maintenance apps come in.  

There are plenty of car maintenance apps on the market, but not all of them
are free. Here are our picks for the best free car maintenance apps, in no
particular order.  

##  **CarFAX Car Care**  

CarFAX's Car Care app is one of the market's most highly rated car maintenance
apps. Its primary aim is to make it easy for users to stay on top of their
maintenance schedule.  

Top features include:  

  1. Recommended maintenance schedule based on unique vehicle details
  2. Upcoming service reminders
  3. Ability to track up to eight vehicles
  4. Safety recall alerts
  5. Service and repair history logs
  6. Alerts for when vehicle registration is due
  7. Cost estimates for auto repairs
  8. Ability to search for local auto shops  

The CarFAX Car Care app is available for free on both iOS and Android.  

##  **Drivvo**  

Drivvo is another top-rated car maintenance app that's available for free on
both iOS and Android. Unlike many of the other apps on this list, Drivvo is
primarily a finance management app designed to help users control their
spending on car expenses. However, it also has various features that can help
users determine its time for maintenance.  

Top features include:  

  1. Mileage and fuel consumption tracking
  2. Fuel efficiency reports
  3. Scheduled service reminders by mileage reading or date
  4. Ability to track multiple vehicles
  5. Service history logs
  6. Maintenance cost estimates
  7. Car expense and repair tracking  

There are many great features on the app's free version, and users can
purchase the pro version to access additional premium features.  

##  **FIXD**  

FIXD is an app that's designed to help users understand and maintain their
cars. It's one of the more comprehensive apps on this list as it doesn't just
provide information on when to service your car but also explains what needs
to be done and why. Users can purchase a sensor to plug into their car, which
will provide real-time information about the health of their vehicle.  

Top features include:  

  1. Vehicle health monitoring
  2. Fault code explanations
  3. Repair cost estimates
  4. Maintenance reminders
  5. Ability to monitor multiple vehicles
  6. Service records  

The FIXD app is available for free on iOS and Android. Additional features
like emissions pre-check and issue forecast are available by subscribing to
FIXD Premium.  

##  **Fuelly**  

Fuelly is a popular fuel economy tracking app that's available for free on
both iOS and Android. While the Fuelly app is not specifically designed for
car maintenance, it can be useful for understanding your car's fuel
consumption. This information can, in turn, be used to help plan for
maintenance and repairs, which is why it's one of the best free car
maintenance apps.  

Top features include:  

  1. Fuel economy tracking
  2. Mileage tracking
  3. Fuel cost calculation
  4. Ability to track multiple vehicles
  5. Detailed fuel logs
  6. Comparison of fuel economy over time  

Users can upgrade to Fuelly Premium to access additional features like the
ability to add photos and PDFs to records.  

##  **Openbay**  

Openbay is a newer entry to the car maintenance app market, but it's already
making waves with its innovative features. The app is designed to help users
easily schedule auto repairs and maintenance by providing cost estimates and
access to a nationwide network of auto repair and auto body shops.  

Top features include:  

  1. Maintenance cost estimates
  2. Ability to book services and make payments with local repair shops directly from the app
  3. Rewards for completing service
  4. Service reminders
  5. Maintenance schedule
  6. Service history log  

The Openbay app is available for free on both iOS and Android.  

##  **Simply Auto**  

Simply Auto is another comprehensive car maintenance app available for free on
iOS and Android. The app is designed to help users manage all aspects of car
ownership, including maintenance, auto repairs, and fuel economy.  

Top features include:  

  1. Mileage and fuel tracking
  2. Fuel efficiency reports
  3. Scheduled service reminders
  4. Ability to track multiple vehicles
  5. Service history logs
  6. Maintenance cost estimates
  7. Repair and expense tracking
  8. Ability to share data with other people who drive your vehicle  

Users can upgrade from the free version of the app with two different in-app
purchases, each offering a set of additional features like unlimited vehicles.  

##  **My Car**  

My Car is an app that's designed to help users keep track of their car's
service history. It's a simple but effective tool that can be used to track
service appointments, maintenance tasks, and repairs. The app is available for
free on iOS and Android.  

Top features include:  

  1. Service records with locations
  2. Fuel mileage tracking
  3. Repair and expense tracking
  4. Statistics and charts for metrics like fuel efficiency, cumulative costs, and more
  5. Ability to manage up to three vehicles
  6. Ability to import data from other apps  

The app's premium version offers access to additional features such as trip
logs, cloud storage, and the ability to set reminders.  

##  **Final Thoughts**  

With so many great apps out there, it has never been easier to stay on top of
your vehicle maintenance. And once you've installed your app of choice, you
will start enjoying the benefits of better car care.
